title: lAlisadaLu magana
sahitya:
lAlisidaLu magana yashOde lAlisidaLu magana


caraNam 1    araLele mAgAyi beraLi gunguraviTTu taraLana maisiri taruNi nODuta higgi
    caraNam 2    bAlakane kene hAlu mosaranIva lIleyindali enna tOLa mEl malagendu
    caraNam 3    muguLu nageyinda muddu tA tArendu jagadoDeyane shrI purandara viTTalana
